definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨冲刷使粘土和有机物比沙粒更多的流入垄沟。

sentences.english: Description : Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨冲刷使粘土和有机物比沙粒更多的流入垄沟。

sentences.english: They can be as tiny as a grain of sand or as large as a golf ball.
sentences.chinese: 大小可细如沙粒也可大似高尔夫球。

sentences.english: We can see numberless grains of sand in a windy day.
sentences.chinese: 在风天，我们能看到无数沙粒。

sentences.english: Wind and water move these grains to many places along the shore.
sentences.chinese: 风浪又把这些沙粒沿着海岸线带到许多地方。

sentences.english: The sands of time are running out for the central star of this the Hourglass Nebula.
sentences.chinese: 对沙漏星云中的中央恒星来说，时间的沙粒正在流逝。

sentences.english: The coarser the grains of sand are, the darker they appear.
sentences.chinese: 沙粒越粗，呈现的颜色就越深。

sentences.english: There were grains of sand all over my car after our trip to the beach.
sentences.chinese: 从海边旅行回来后，我的车上到处都是沙粒儿。

sentences.english: Instead of kneeling in the sand, Catching teardrops in my hand.
sentences.chinese: 以替代沙粒上的下跪，抓住手中滴下的泪水。

sentences.english: Biogenic sand, which forms from the remains of marine life, is the major ingredient of many tropical beaches.
sentences.chinese: 有一些热带海滩上的沙粒来自于海洋生物体。

sentences.english: Powder-perfect sand squishes between the toes and warm turquoise waves lap the beach.
sentences.chinese: 海滩冲击着脚趾和温暖的绿松石之间的沙粒。

sentences.english: Foliage is frog skin shape the white sands, commonly known as "toad back".
sentences.chinese: 叶面呈蛙皮状沙粒白点，雅称“虾蟆背”。

sentences.english: I'd like to paint it sand-coloured. Beige.
sentences.chinese: 我想将它漆成沙粒的颜色，米黄色。

sentences.english: Loves you truly the girl, really very mean-spirited , in the eye allows not to be below sand.
sentences.chinese: 真正爱你的女孩，真的很小气，眼里容不下一颗沙粒。

sentences.english: The shell used the little sand to make a pearl.
sentences.chinese: 河蚌把这颗沙粒变成了一粒珍珠。

sentences.english: There were grains of sand ih the crotch of her swimming costume.
sentences.chinese: 她的泳装裤裆里有一些沙粒。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
